results.title: QT shortening: a proarrhythmic safety surrogate measure or an inappropriate indicator of it?

results.title: Role of the Frank-Starling mechanism during maximal semisupine exercise after oral atenolol.
results.text_hl: We conclude that @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ changes the left ventricular response to maximal semisupine exercise in normal man, with @DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@dilatation@@@ and a concomitant increase in systolic @<m>DISEASE_Heart_defects_limb_shortening</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535850 @@@myocardial shortening@@@.

results.title: Alleviation of myocardial dysfunction and abnormal lactate metabolism during coronary stenosis in dogs by ICI 118,551.
results.text_hl: Increasing heart rate by pacing abolished the beneficial effects of @CHEMICAL_ICI_118551 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C026777 @@@ICI 118,551@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Heart_defects_limb_shortening</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535850 @@@ischemic myocardial segment shortening@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Lactic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019344 @@@lactate@@@ metabolism.
